Question: Skyworks Solutions, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Skyworks Solutions, Inc.

Product Highlight at CES 2024

- Demonstrating high-performance products for automotive and smart city utility applications
- Showcasing fully integrated front-end module (FEM) technology for radio frequency transmission range extension
- Introducing a new solution for direct communication between vehicles for the cellular vehicle-to-everything (C-V2X) standard
- Tailoring smart city technology with the Wireless Smart Utility Network (Wi-SUN) specifications
- Exhibiting a wide array of products supporting automotive, 5G infrastructure, and more

Key Products Showcased at CES 2024

- IoT Front-End Modules
- Consumer High-Power Front-End Modules for Wi-Fi 7 Applications
- Automotive Front-End Modules
- 5G Wireless Infrastructure
- Industrial Isolated Gate Drivers
- Integrated Isolated RS-485 Transceivers
- Isolated Current and Voltage Sensors
